blocks.title: Why have a business website made?
blocks.subtitle: Benefits of having a business website made
blocks.text:
As a professional freelancer specialized in professional web design, SEO, and web development, I create state-of-the-art digital solutions with a focus on your needs. Examples are: regular business websites, applications for administrative purposes (e.g. selecting personnel for certain tasks), webshops, food delivery web applications, CRMs, and more. In other words: anything that needs to appear on the screen to increase your business' efficiency and/or attract more users, ultimately generating more revenue.

A business website offers numerous advantages for both starting and established entrepreneurs. First, it immediately conveys trust, making potential customers more likely to reach out or make a purchase. Additionally, a well-designed website ensures better findability in search engines like Google, especially when optimized for SEO. It also gives you the opportunity to clearly communicate your brand identity and be available to visitors 24/7, without having to be physically present. Finally, a business website helps streamline processes, such as quote requests, customer contact, and even sales, saving you time and money in the long run.

img.alt: Workstation with 2 monitors and a keyboard.

blocks.title: Pricing
blocks.subtitle: Affordable Services
blocks.text:
Discover our competitive prices for website development. Transparent rates with no hidden costs. From just €49 per month, you get a professional business website including numerous benefits, without hidden costs. The price varies slightly depending on the complexity and size of your specific project.

In addition to a professional business website, you receive lifetime free hosting, domain name, maintenance, updates, and more to save time and costs! Let me handle all administrative tasks, so you can fully focus on growing your business.

items.title: Professional business website
items.details: It goes without saying that your website looks professional and business-like. This is important for your company.

items.title: Excellent display on all devices
items.details: Your website will look good on all devices such as smartphones, tablets, and computers.

items.title: Lifetime FREE hosting
items.details: You never have to pay for hosting. I'll take care of everything for you. Hosting: putting your website online.

items.title: Lifetime FREE domain name
items.details: You never have to pay for a domain name. I'll take care of everything for you. Domain name: your website address (e.g., www.yourcompany.com)

items.title: Lifetime FREE maintenance and updates
items.details: I always ensure that your website is and remains up-to-date so that it always functions excellently. You don't have to worry about updates or maintenance.

items.title: Excellent SEO on your website, FREE
items.details: I make sure your website ranks well in Google so you get more visitors. SEO: search engine optimization. This is important for your website to be found in Google and other search engines.

items.title: FREE logos
items.details: You read that right! With a subscription, you receive a free logo from my collection, completely tailored to your wishes. And you can have as many as you want.

items.title: Administration & invoices handled by me
items.details: I handle all administration and invoicing for you, such as the website, hosting, and domain name. You don't have to worry about anything.

items.title: 24/7 support
items.details: Do you have questions or comments? You can always contact me. I'm happy to help you at no additional cost.

items.title: Pay annually? No startup costs!
items.details: Yup, you read that right! No startup costs with annual payment. You only pay for the subscription itself.

items.title: Ready in about 5 days
items.details: Your website will be ready in approximately 5 days.

items.title: Not satisfied? 30-day money back
items.details: Not satisfied? No problem, you get your money back within 30 days.

blocks.title: Frequently Asked Questions
blocks.subtitle: Questions & Answers
blocks.text: Below you'll find a list of frequently asked questions about web design and websites. If you have another question, don't hesitate to contact me.

items.title: What is the average price for having a business website created?
items.description: The average price for having a website created varies greatly, depending on the complexity of the project, the functionalities you need, and the experience of the web designer. Fortunately, with me, you only pay €49 excl. VAT or €44 per month if you opt for an annual subscription. It comes with many benefits, such as a free domain name, hosting, maintenance, and support.

items.title: Can I request a quote for a website?
items.description: Certainly, but why? When you know that you only pay €49 per month excl. VAT or €44 per month for a professional website if you opt for an annual subscription? So you already know the price. You can directly subscribe by contacting me and have your website online in about 5 days. Of course, you can also contact me for more information.

items.title: What are the startup costs?
items.description: If you opt for an annual subscription, you pay no startup costs. You only pay €530 per year (€44 per month). If you opt for a monthly subscription, you pay a one-time fee of €180 for startup costs excl. VAT.

items.title: What is SEO?
items.description: SEO stands for search engine optimization. It is the process of improving the quality and quantity of website traffic to a website or webpage from search engines. SEO focuses on unpaid results rather than direct traffic or paid traffic. This is something I incorporate as standard in my websites.

items.title: What is a domain name?
items.description: A domain name is a unique name that is used to identify an IP address on the internet. A domain name is an address that allows people to find your website on the internet. I will handle the domain name for you and cover the costs. You don't need to worry about this.

items.title: What is hosting?
items.description: Web hosting is a service that allows businesses and individuals the ability to place their website or web page on the internet. A web host, or web hosting service provider, is a business that provides the technologies and services needed for the website or webpage to be viewed on the internet. I will handle the hosting for you and cover the costs. You don't need to worry about this.

blocks.title: Contact
blocks.text: Do you have questions or interest in a business website or a custom web application to grow your business? Get in touch today!
